Package edu.databaseAccessors

Class RoomDatabase

java.lang.Object
edu.databaseAccessors.RoomDatabase
public class RoomDatabase extends Object
Database to record all the rooms This class documents a collection of rooms and reads/writes to the database file

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom(Room room, String bedType, int numOfBeds, boolean smokingStatus, double price)
      Updates the details of a room in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - The Room object representing the room to be updated.
      bedType - The type of bed in the room.
      numOfBeds - The number of beds in the room.
      smokingStatus - The smoking availability status of the room.
      price - The new price of the room.
